resources.string: The goal is to identify the matching pairs by memorizing the position of each card. How to do this?
1.Tap a tile, it will reveal you an emoji.
2. Now think of a tile other than that which on tapping will reveal same emoji as the previous one.
Case 1: if both turn out to be the same. Good, it will count as success. Go for the next tiles.
Case 2: if both turn out to be different, keep in mind, the position of the forbidden emoji tiles. so that when in next turn you find a tile of similar emoji, you can make them match.
